create_purchasesdb module

create_purchasesdb.create_purchases_table()[source]

Create the ‘purchases’ table in the database if it does not exist.

create_purchasesdb.delete_latest_purchase(customer_username)[source]

Delete the latest purchase from the database.

Parameters:

customer_username – A string representing the customer’s user name

Returns:

A dictionary representing the deleted purchase

Return type:

dict

create_purchasesdb.drop_purchases_table()[source]

Drop the ‘historical_purchases’ table from the database.

create_purchasesdb.get_purchases_by_username(customer_username)[source]

Retrieve customer historical purchases based on the provided username.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer

Returns:

A list representing all the purchases made by a customer if found, else None

Return type:

list or None

create_purchasesdb.insert_purchase(customer_username, good_name, price)[source]

Insert a new purchase into the database.

Parameters:

customer (dict) – A dictionary representing the customer

Returns:

A dictionary representing the inserted customer

Return type:

dict
